What payment methods do you accept?: We accept Visa, MasterCard, American Express, and PayPal.
How can I contact customer support?: You can contact our customer support at support@example.com.
Where are you located?: We are located at 123 Main Street, Anytown, USA.
What are your business hours?: Our business hours are Monday to Friday, 9 AM to 5 PM.
Do you ship internationally?: Yes, we ship internationally. Additional charges may apply.
How can I track my order?: You can track your order using the tracking number provided in your shipping confirmation email.
What is your cancellation policy?: You can cancel your order within 24 hours of placing it.
Do you offer gift cards?: Yes, we offer gift cards in various denominations.
Can I change my shipping address?: You can change your shipping address before your order is shipped.
Do you offer discounts for bulk orders?: Yes, we offer discounts for bulk orders. Please contact sales@example.com for more information.
What is your warranty policy?: We offer a one-year warranty on all our products.
Can I return a product if I'm not satisf: Yes, you can return a product within 30 days if you are not satisfied.
How long does shipping take?: Shipping typically takes 5-7 business days within the USA and 10-15 business days internationally.
What if my order is damaged or incorrect: If your order is damaged or incorrect, please contact our customer support immediately.
How do I reset my password?: To reset your password, click on the 'Forgot Password' link on the login page.
Can I sign up for a newsletter?: Yes, you can sign up for our newsletter to receive updates and promotions.
Do you offer customer support on weekend: Our customer support is available Monday to Friday, 9 AM to 5 PM.
